text: Netease Cloud Music Privacy Policy
Update date: May 11, 2021
Effective date: May 11, 2021

[Foreword] Welcome to the service provided by "Netease Cloud Music" (referring to NetEase Cloud Music website, its client program, mobile application products, applets, hereinafter referred to as "Netease Cloud Music")!

We know the importance of personal information to you, and solemnly promise to protect the personal information and privacy security of users who use Netease Cloud Music (hereinafter collectively referred to as "user" or "you").
When you use Netease Cloud Music, we may collect and use your relevant personal information and user information (hereinafter collectively referred to as "information").
We hope to explain related matters such as "NetEase Cloud Music Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "Privacy Policy" or "This Policy") to explain to youGood protection of your rights.

[Special Tips] Please read carefully before using Netease Cloud Music (please read it with the guardian with the guardian) and understand this policy (especially the content marked by bold or below) to make appropriate choices.
When you agree with this policy, you have agreed that we have agreed to process your relevant information in accordance with this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Agree with this policy means that you have agreed to deal with your relevant information in accordance with this policy.

text: Unless you have read and accept all the terms of this policy, you should not use Netease Cloud Music.
Users under the age of 14, at the same time applying this "Privacy Policy" and "NetEase Cloud Music Children's Personal Information Protection Rules and Guardians"
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Users under the age of 14, and apply this "Privacy Policy" and "NetEase Cloud Music Children's Personal Information Protection Rules and Guardian Notes".

text: This policy is suitable for Netease Cloud Music, such as the "Privacy Policy of Netease Group" and "NetEase Cloud Music Service Terms" in the same clause inconsistent, which is subject to this policy.
If a single service we provide is not applicable to this policy, the service will explicitly explicitly eliminate the applicable policy in an appropriate manner.
Table of contents
1. How do we collect and use personal information
2. How do we use cookies or similar technologies
Third, we may share, transfer and disclose personal information

Nine, how to contact us
1. How do we collect and use personal information
We collect your personal information mainly to use Netease Cloud Music more easily and more satisfaction with you and other users.
Our goal is to provide all Internet users with a secure and interesting Internet experience.
And this information helps us achieve this goal.
(1) We will collect and obtain your personal information through the following channels:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect personal information through the following channels:

text: 1. The information you provide.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the information you provide.

text: For example:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) When you register for Netease Cloud Music Account or use Netease Cloud Music Services, you provide information to us;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the information you provided when registering the NetEase Cloud Music account or using the service.

text: (2) The shared information provided by the third party through Netease Cloud Music Services, and the information stored when you use Netease Cloud Music Services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the sharing information you provided to a third party and the information stored when you use the service.

text: Please note that if you publish or published the information uploaded or published in the open area where other users can see in the NetEase Cloud Music Service, your information you uploaded or published by others may be disclosed. These information may be by others by othersCollect and use it.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Risk
rewrite: If you disclose your information, these information may be collected and used by others.

text: When you find that others collect or use your information, you can contact us through the feedback channels listed in the chapter of the "How to contact us" in this policy.
2. Your information shared by a third party.
That is, third -party provides shared information on your tertiary cloud music service.
3. The information we get.
When you use Netease Cloud Music services, we collect, summarize, and record information, such as log information, location information, and equipment information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We collect, summarize, and record information, such as log information, location information, and equipment information.

text: (2) We will collect and use your personal information for the following goals:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you understand and agree, we want to provide your products and services to be perfect, so we will continue to improve our products and services, which means that with the iteration, expansion, and upgrading of the products and services, we may often launchNew service or business functions or re -divide business functions, and may need to collect new personal information or change the purpose or method of using personal information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: Please note that if we want to use your personal information in other uses that have not been stated in this policy or collect unreasonable other personal information, we will use page prompts, interactive processes, website announcements or other methods to recruit separately.Get your consent.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If we use personal information for other uses or additional personal information, we will obtain your consent separately.

text: Once you agree, these additional uses will be regarded as part of this policy, and these additional information will also apply this policy.
In the process, if you have any questions, you can contact us through the feedback channels listed in the chapter "How to contact us" in this policy, and we will answer you as soon as possible.
1. Audio and video display, play and download service
In the process of using audio and video display and playback, we need to collect the browsing and play history, collection, etc. of your use of your use.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need to collect the history of views and playbacks of your viewing and playback during the playback process.

text: If you need to use the download function, we will apply for the storage authority of your device.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you use the download function, you will apply for the storage authority of your device.

text: If you refuse to provide storage permissions, it will cause you not to use Netease Cloud Music to download songs, videos and other content, but it will not affect your most basic audio and video display and playback services.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Refusing to provide storage permissions will cause the download service that cannot be used, but does not affect your most basic audio and video display and playback services.

text: 2. Realize local music functions
When you use the local music function in Netease Cloud Music, we need to visit your device storage permissions/media and Apple, MUSIC permissions, and local music information in your device.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: When using local music functions, you need to access your device storage permissions/media and Apple Music permissions, as well as local music information.

text: We visit these permissions and collect these information to show you your local song information in order to check and play your local music through Netease Cloud Music.
label: First Party Collection Information
Permission Acquisition

text: 3. Provide search service
When you use the search function, we need to collect the words you search, browsing records and time, time search time, and the number of interaction with them.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need to collect the words you searches, browsing records and time, search time, and the number of interaction with them.

text: We collect this information to provide you with the content you need and the service that may be more interested in.
4. Help you complete the registration and login
In order to experience richer Netease Cloud Music services, you can register and log in to Netease Cloud Music account.

You need to provide basic registration or login information, including mobile phone numbers, verification code matching results (personal sensitive information), and create your account number, username and password.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect basic registration or login information, including mobile phone numbers and verification code matching results (personal sensitive information), which is used to create account numbers, usernames and passwords.

text: If you only need to use the basic functions such as search, browsing, and audition of some songs, you do not need to register or log in and provide the above information.
You can also log in with the third -party platform account we support.

If you log in to the account of a third -party platform, we will obtain the relevant information under the third party account (including: user name, nickname, avatar, region, gender, and identity based on your authorization.Verification information (mobile phone number, verification code matching result).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Log in to use the account number of a third -party platform will obtain the relevant information under the third -party account (including: user name, nickname, avatar, region, gender, specifically your authorization content) and identity verification information (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone number (mobile phone numberThe verification code matching results).

text: We collect this information to provide you with account login service and ensure your account security.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to authorize such information, you will not be able to log in to our platform with an account on a third -party platform, but it will not affect the normal use of other functions we provide for you.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to authorize the information, you will not be able to log in to the platform on the third -party platform account, but it will not affect the normal use of other functions.

text: During the registration process, if you provide the following additional information, it will help us provide you with personalized recommendations and better service experiences: for example, your nickname, profile, avatar, gender, region, birthday, school.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Providing additional information will help us provide personalized recommendations and better service experiences.

text: If you do not provide this information, it will not affect your basic function of using Netease Cloud Music.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide additional information, it will not affect your basic function of using Netease Cloud Music.

text: However, in accordance with the requirements of relevant laws and regulations, or to meet the user identity authenticity, ensure system and service security needs, you may need to perform real -name authentication before using specific functions and services.
We will collect your identity certification information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect your identity certification information.

text: For example: when you apply for the enrolled musician, the anchor of the radio, and the video expert in Netease Cloud Music, we need to collect your mobile phone number, ID number, real name, facial recognition characteristics (static or dynamic), and face face recognition certificationItems
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your mobile phone number, ID number, real name, facial recognition features (static or dynamic), and face face recognition certification.

text: When you purchase tickets or apply for free services through NetEase Cloud Music, you need to provide your mobile phone number, ID number, and real name;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your mobile phone number, ID number, and real name for purchasing tickets or applying for non -flow -free services.

label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: If you do not provide identity authentication information, we will not be able to provide you with related functions and services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Without providing identity authentication information, we will not be able to provide you with related functions and services.

text: In order to achieve the purpose of identity certification, you agree and authorize that we can provide, inquire, and check your aforementioned identity information on our own or entrusted to the third direction of the relevant identity authentication agency (such as personal credit reporting agencies, government departments, etc.).
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You agree and authorize that we can provide, inquire, and check your aforementioned identity information for relevant identity authentication agencies (such as personal credit reporting agencies, government departments, etc.) in the third direction.

text: Please note that your mobile phone number, verification code matching result, ID number, real name, facial feature recognition information, etc. are personal sensitive information. Please provide it with caution.Normal use and service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Please be careful to provide personal sensitive information.

text: At the same time, we also provide the cancellation function of the registered account. In the case that meets the requirements of the service agreement and the relevant national laws and regulations, you can cancel the account on your own "delete account" page.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can cancel your account on your own "Delete account" page.

text: You can log in to NetEase Cloud Music official website https://music.163.com/, click Personal Settings -Binding Settings -Delete the account, and perform the corresponding operation according to the prompts.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can log in to NetEase Cloud Music official website https://music.163.com/, click Personal Settings -Binding Settings -Delete account.

text: After the cancellation of your Netease Cloud Music account, we will stop providing you with Netease Cloud Music services, and delete your personal information or do anonymous processing according to your requirements, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: After cancellation, it will stop providing services, delete your personal information or do anonymous processing, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.

text: 5. Scan the QR code/AR scanning/shooting photos and related editing functions

When you use scanning QR codes/AR scanning/shooting photos, we need to authorize us to access the camera permissions and storage permissions of your device, and collect pictures you provide based on scanning QR codes and photos uploaded after taking photos.information.

Important

When you use voice interaction, humming recognition, and recording function, we need to authorize us to access your microphone permission/recording right, and may collect your voice interaction information and recording sounds.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need you to authorize the microphone permissions/recording permissions, and may collect your voice interaction information and recording sound.

First Party Collection Information

text: Your sound texture is a personal sensitive information, please provide it with caution.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: The videos you provide may contain personal sensitive information, please provide it with caution.

text: 7. People nearby/Listen together

If you use "nearby people" or "listening together" functions, we need to authorize us to access your location permissions and collect your location information in order to recommend you nearby users or show you in the "Listening Together" functionThe distance with other users.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information

Edit/Control

When you use the information release function in Netease Cloud Music, according to the requirements of relevant laws and regulations, we need to collect your mobile phone number and verification code matching results (personal sensitive information).

First Party Collection Information

Important
First Party Collection Information

Important
First Party Collection Information

label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 9. Friends recommendation function

In order to recommend the person you might know, we need to authorize us to visit the communication records in your mobile phone and collect the relevant address book information (including the name of the contact person and the corresponding contact information, the list of friends), so that we recommend you to youThe contact in the address book, or authorize us to get the list of friends in your Weibo.

Risk

label: Important
Edit/Control

When you use a music alarm clock/setting ringtone service, you need to turn on the storage permissions and download the music alarm clock or ringtone.

Important

Important

Important

text: 15. Maintain account security, ensure normal operation of services, and optimize service experience

In the process of using our service, to identify the abnormal status of the account, understand the product adaptability, provide you with basic services such as browsing, searching, and ensure the normal operation of the service and optimize the service experience.The services you use and the information are related to this information. This information includes:

label: Important
First Party Collection Information

If we use this type of non -personal information with other information to identify a specific natural person or use it with personal information, during the combination of use, such non -personal information will be regarded as personal information, except for obtaining your authorization.Or in addition to other provisions of laws and regulations, we will anonymous and de -identification processing of this type of personal information.

Data Security
rewrite: If the combination of non -personal information and other information is used to identify natural persons, this type of personal information will be anonymous and de -identified.

text: This information will be handled and protected as your personal information in accordance with this privacy policy.

text: 17. Provide information display and push of goods or services

Based on the information you provided to us, the information we may collect, and your information we collected indirectly (such as your browsing, searching and listening records, equipment information, location information, order information), we may be based onThe combination of one or several information above, conduct recommendation algorithm modeling, programmatic advertising recommendation algorithm modeling, user behavior analysis, and user portraits to extract your browsing, search preferences, behavioral habits, location information related features in orderProvide you with page display and recommendation of personalized content that meets your needs.

and

We will carry out personalized recommendation or directional push in accordance with the following rules, and provide you with the corresponding exit mechanism:
label: Important
Usage

Usage

text: You can turn off the "Personalized Service" switch through the "Settings-Message and Privacy Settings-Personalized Service" page.

Edit/Control

18. Provide you with customer service or other user response functions

When you contact our customer service or use other users to respond to functions (such as selling after -sale after sale, personal information protection complaints or suggestions, other customer complaints and needs), we may need you to provide the necessary personal informationUser identity to ensure your account and system security.
label: Important
